title: Grim Legends The Forsaken Bride Collectors Edition-Wendy99
description:
::::::::: WENDY99 PRESENTS :::::::::


:::: Grim Legends The Forsaken Bride Collectors Edition-Wendy99 ::::


::Information::


Grim Legends The Forsaken Bride Collectors Edition


Genre: Adventure | Hidden Object | Puzzle


Within the shadow of an ancient forest, on the bottom of the foggy valley, stands the lonely village of Ravenbrook. Its perimeter is protected by the villagers' charms, but beyond the legends and the magic, the gloomy forests and wailing wind, lies a chasm so deep and feared, it is known by the villagers only as The Abyss. No one knows what lies within, but when a strange visitor arrives in Ravenbrook just before a young bride is kidnapped, the villagers find justification for their superstitionsÃ¢â‚¬Â¦


On this night, a young woman returns home for her twin sister's wedding. They haven't seen each other in years. But the ceremony is interrupted by the intrusion of a gigantic bear Ã¢â‚¬â€œ a dark hero of local legend, who kidnaps the bride. Wasting no time, and accompanied by Edward Ã¢â‚¬â€œ the would-be husband of her sister - the Heroine follows the beast's trail deep into a world of legends and magic. The quest to find Lilly will lead her sister through a dangerous, mystical forest full of fairies and magical beings, as well as places that put an unspeakable terror into the hearts of simple folk. Each clue leading to her kidnapped sister will bring the heroine closer to the truth about her and her sister. The main protagonist will learn that words spoken in a world where ancient magic is part of the reality have a tremendous power. The events that she will witness will make her realise, that grim legends can sometimes come into lifeÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ Can she save her sister and discover what connects the legendary bear and a mysterious witch with the Haugwitz family curse? What will be the conclusion to this grim legend?


This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won't find in the standard version.


The Collector's Edition includes:


Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Thrilling mature story with a dark secret under its surface
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Two bonus story chapters
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Carefully crafted and unique fantasy world
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 39 captivating, hand-painted locations
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Enhanced "gameplay adventureÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ (including shooting a crossbow)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Trophies and Achievements to unlock!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Wallpapers, Soundtracks, Concept Art and more!


System Requirements:


OS: Windows XP | Windows Vista | Windows 7 | Windows 8
CPU: 1.6 GHz
RAM: 512 MB
DirectX: 9.0
Hard Drive: 785 MB
Browser: Internet Explorer 7 or later


Install and play!
